overview: Yeon-ah wanted to celebrate her mother's birthday. She tried to call her dead father’s soul by mimicking the necromancy video on YouTube. To prepare the food for the necromancy, she tried to make dalgona, which was used to be made with father by herself but she failed and failed. In the meantime, she finally made dalgona after finding father’s video on an old camera and organized a birthday party for her mother from work
title: DALGONA
